aggregate(model)¶

Signs up for aggregation and wait for it to start

Parameters

model (object) – Model to aggregate

Returns

Aggregated model

Return type

object

register_callbacks()¶

Assigns proper callbacks to corresponding messages

property time_elapsed¶

Getter that returns the amount of time the last aggregation has taken

Returns

A number of seconds that the last aggregation has taken between being assigned aggregation and finishing the aggregation. If no aggregation has taken place yet, None will be returned

Return type

float or None
